capabilities.name: Deliver Results
capabilities.description: Ensures efficient and safe undertaking of works and maintenance activities, assists with planning and tracking of works and resources.

capabilities.name: Plan and Prioritise
capabilities.description: Assists with planning, prioritisation, scheduling of works and resources, and staff rostering.

capabilities.name: Communicate Effectively
capabilities.description: Requires well-developed communication skills for collaboration with stakeholders, contractors, and staff.

capabilities.name: Work Collaboratively
capabilities.description: Coordinates the field teamwork program in collaboration with the Team Leader Field Operations and other supervisors.

capabilities.name: Project Management
capabilities.description: Involved in project management, including planning and delivery of projects and work programs.

capabilities.name: Manage Reform and Change
capabilities.description: Supports and promotes change in field operations and maintenance activities.

capabilities.name: Demonstrate Accountability
capabilities.description: Responsible for budget management and reporting, adhering to legislation and policy.

capabilities.name: Finance
capabilities.description: Experience in cost estimation, budgeting, and financial management related to field operations.

capabilities.name: Procurement and Contract Management
capabilities.description: Coordinates with contractors and manages contractor relationships and performance.

skills.name: Leadership in Field Operations
skills.description: Supervisory and team leadership skills for field and operational activities, including construction, maintenance, and pest control.

skills.name: Fire Management
skills.description: Ability and experience in crew leadership for fire management, including obtaining necessary firefighting certifications.

skills.name: Machinery Operation
skills.description: Operation of machinery, plant, and equipment for maintenance and construction work.

generalRole.name: Field Operations Supervisor
generalRole.title: Field Operations Supervisor
generalRole.description: This role involves supervising and coordinating field operations and maintenance activities, including planning, budgeting, and project management, to ensure the efficient and safe execution of work programs.
